title: vElanE ena mana
sahitya:
vElanE en mana vEdanai tIrumO nIla mayilOnE lIlA vinOdanE


anupallavi

  kAlanai udaitta nIlakaNTha nAthan bAlanE bhakta pAlanE vaDi-


caraNam    ten pazhanikkunnai tEDi vandu paNiyum anbarukkillaiyanrO allal tarum tollai
un padamonrE urutuNai enru nAn eNNi vanda pOdum Enindap-parAmukham
